#summary Attaching local storage

= Attaching local storage =

If your local system administrator is serving files with an https file server, you can attach a directory from this server as "grid_home" and manage it with the file manager of the portal.

<img src="http://grid-dk.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/grid_home.png" width="700"></img>

<br /><br />
Your system administrator can take a look at [http://grid.dk/#2 grid.dk] to see how to serve files over https.
